product_name: Hi-Tec Oakhurst Trail WP Hiking Boots - Kids' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With over-the-ankle coverage and waterproof leather uppers, the kids' Hi-Tec Oakhurst Trail Waterproof Hiking Boots are built to keep little feet feeling great during long days on challenging trails. Waterproof full-grain and nubuck leather uppers offer flexible durability; synthetic linings wick moisture away from feet for additional comfort. Big-Fit System accommodates growing feet; just remove the 2nd insole to buy 2-3 months of extra time before your young adventurer outgrows the boots. Padded collars protect ankles; gusseted tongues keep out debris, and tongue and heel loops aid entry. Removable EVA insoles and compression-molded EVA midsoles deliver comfortable cushioning and lasting support for long days on the trail. Carbon rubber outsoles offer solid traction on uneven ground. Closeout.
short_description: With over-the-ankle coverage and waterproof leather uppers, the kids' Hi-Tec Oakhurst Trail Waterproof Hiking Boots are built to keep little feet feeling great during long days on challenging trails.
